entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13 except minus 20 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17 except temperature rising to minus 7 along the coast.
